title: small_orange_insect_on_pumpkin_leaf
summary: Small orange insect observed on pumpkin leaf.
description: Image documents a small orange-colored insect present on a pumpkin leaf. Local residents commonly refer to the insect as 'tao-thong' (ladybug), but the species is not confirmed. The insect is frequently observed feeding on pumpkin leaves in this area. No chemical substances are used at this location.

external_reference.note: External image reference for independent verification.
